helper.url: Make sure to include http:// or https:// at the beginning of the URL.

password.title: Password Protection
password.description: Protect your tag with a password. Only those who know the password can view the content.
password.label: Set Password
password.warning: Don't forget your password! People without this password won't be able to view the tag content.

lock.title: Lock Tag
lock.description: Lock the tag after writing. This action cannot be undone and the tag cannot be modified again.
lock.infoText: Locking makes the tag permanently 'read-only'. This process makes physical changes and can never be undone. After locking, the tag content cannot be changed by any device.
lock.label: Lock Tag
lock.description: Warning: Tag locking cannot be undone!

status.writing: Writing... Place your device near the NFC tag.
status.successProtected: Successfully encrypted and written to tag

nfc.instructions: Bring your device close to the tag to write.
nfc.error: This device doesn't support NFC or NFC is disabled.

confirmLock.title: Lock Tag
confirmLock.message: The NFC tag was successfully written. Do you want to lock the tag now? This action cannot be undone and the tag cannot be written again.
